meanings.definition: To ask someone questions to test their knowledge or understanding.
meanings.sent1: The teacher quizzed the students on their math skills.
meanings.sent2: She quizzed her friend on the capitals of different countries.
meanings.sent3: During the game, the players quizzed each other on trivia facts.
meanings.sent4: The detective quizzed the suspect to uncover the truth.
meanings.sent5: The quiz show host quizzed the contestants with challenging questions.

meanings.definition: To examine or inspect closely or thoroughly.
meanings.sent1: The scientist quizzed the data for any errors.
meanings.sent2: He quizzed the document for any spelling mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat quizzed the new toy with great interest.
meanings.sent4: The jeweler quizzed the gemstone for flaws under the light.
meanings.sent5: The inspector quizzed the building for structural integrity.
